sent.orig: The mechanism was based on CBR and combined Fuzzy set theory and SCBR(secondary-CBR)together.
sent.trans: 该混合机制以CBR为基础，综合了模糊集理论和SCBR(secondary-CBR)技术。

sent.orig: The paper was introduction fatty primary secondary amine of secondary amines and production process and application.
sent.trans: 本文介绍了脂肪仲胺的反应原理、生产工艺及其应用。

sent.orig: Secondary trimming is needed to separate the finished product from the excess material secondary cavity.
sent.trans: 负面因素方面，溢流的材料必须循环使用、它也带来切除这一多余工序。

sent.orig: Secondary loop includes current transformer, voltage transformer, secondary wiring, electronic energy meter and burden monitoring units.
sent.trans: 二次回路主要由电流互感器、电压互感器、二次回路、电能表及负荷监控单元组成。
